document_data.name: Sparks Musgravel
document_data.mainbody:
'''Sparks Musgravel''' was a member of [[The Guild]] from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Better you than me. I'd take an empty alley over the Guildhall these days.''|Sparks Musgravel}}
document_data.Description: Sparks was a middle-aged [[human]] man of light complexion. He had green eyes and wavy blonde hair. Like other grunts of the Guild, Sparks wore green-colored [[wizard]]ly garb and carried a simple [[staff]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Sparks Musgravel was tasked with standing guard of the secret entrance into Baldur's Gate's [[Undercellar]] where The Guild's Guildhall was hidden. Whilst a [[half-orc]]ish enforcer [[Tusgront]] manned the main entrance, Sparks was ready to dispatch of any unwanted guest from a distance.
